channel.title: Still need COMPILE help = REP ++
channel.description:
I hope somebody can help me now. I've asked this question like, i think 3 times. The tutorial 'How to make a server' of 'Mod Taharok', if i put that in my compile.bat, not working. [b]So, what do i have to put in my Compile.bat??[/b] I'm Using TestScape. And i have java type: 1.6.0
My error if i compile:
[URL=http://www.putfile.com/pic.php?img=4252198][img]http://img1.putfile.com/thumb/12/34712211399.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Still need COMPILE help = REP ++
item.dc:creator: @wtx_pk3r wtx pk3r
item.description:
@wtx_pk3r wrote:

:: ::
:: All of the following code is © Copywrited 2006-2007, ::
:: Grene Penguin Entertainment. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
cls
:menu
title Runserver + Compiler version 1.1
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo.
echo.
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
if %compile%==r goto run
if %compile%==R goto run
if %compile%==e goto end
if %compile%==E goto end
if %compile#==* goto error
goto error
:compile
cls
title Compiler
if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac)
:compile2
if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror)
:compile3
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compileerror
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:run
cls
title Runserver
if exist .server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror)
:run2
set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar
cls
goto run3
:run3
%java% server
pause
cls
goto menu
:servererror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:end
cls
exit
:checkjavac
if exist “%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe” (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2)
:checkjavac2
if exist “%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe” (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3)
:checkjavac3
if exist “%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe” (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4)
:checkjavac4
if exist “%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5)
:checkjavac5
if exist “%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_10injavac.exe” (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6)
:checkjavac6
if exist “%programfiles%Javajdk1.6.0injavac.exe” (goto setjavac6) else (goto javacerror)
:setjavac
set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_06injavac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac2
set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_07injavac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac3
set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_08injavac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac4
set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac5
set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.5.0_10injavac.exe"
goto compile2
set javac="%programfiles%Javajdk1.6.0injavac.exe"
goto compile2
:javacerror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 Update 6-10 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download
echo the newest JDK 5.0 Update.
pause
cls
goto menu
[/code]

EDIT YOUR COMPILE.BAT AND DELETE EVERTING IN THERE AND ADD THIS CODE I POSTED.

~WTX PK3R[br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 10:52:25 AM[/size][hr]rep++ me

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @devindagod devindagod
item.description:
@devindagod wrote:

this is the best

@echo off
cls
:menu
title Runserver + Compiler version 1.1
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo.
echo.
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
if %compile%==r goto run
if %compile%==R goto run
if %compile%==e goto end
if %compile%==E goto end
if %compile#==* goto error
goto error
:compile
cls
title Compiler
if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac)
:compile2
if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror)
:compile3
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compileerror
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:run
cls
title Runserver
if exist .\server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror)
:run2
set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar
cls
goto run3
:run3
%java% server
pause
cls
goto menu
:servererror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:end
cls
exit
:checkjavac
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2)
:checkjavac2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3)
:checkjavac3
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4)
:checkjavac4
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5)
:checkjavac5
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6)
:checkjavac6
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac6) else (goto javacerror)
:setjavac
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac2
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac3
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac4
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac5
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:javacerror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 Update 6-10 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download
echo the newest JDK 5.0 Update.

cls
goto menu

item.dc:creator: @h3ll_pure h3ll pure
item.description:
@h3ll_pure wrote:

if you want one that can compile and run your server go on compile.bat and edit it to this:

::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:: ::
:: All of the following code is © Copywrited 2006-2007, ::
:: Grene Penguin Entertainment. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
cls
:menu
title Runserver + Compiler version 1.1
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo.
echo.
set /p compile=Option:
if %compile%==c goto compile
if %compile%==C goto compile
if %compile%==r goto run
if %compile%==R goto run
if %compile%==e goto end
if %compile%==E goto end
if %compile#==* goto error
goto error
:compile
cls
title Compiler
if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac)
:compile2
if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror)
:compile3
%javac% -cp . *.java
pause
cls
goto menu
:compileerror
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:run
cls
title Runserver
if exist .\server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror)
:run2
set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar
cls
goto run3
:run3
%java% server
pause
cls
goto menu
:servererror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:error
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:end
cls
exit
:checkjavac
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2)
:checkjavac2
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3)
:checkjavac3
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4)
:checkjavac4
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5)
:checkjavac5
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6)
:checkjavac6
if exist “%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” (goto setjavac6) else (goto javacerror)
:setjavac
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac2
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac3
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac4
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:setjavac5
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe"
goto compile2
:javacerror
cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 Update 6-10 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download

goto menu

@ZenZei wrote:

[code]@echo off
COLOR 0c
title SERVERNAMEHERE Compiler

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

@echo off
COLOR 0c
title SERVERNAMEHERE Compiler

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now starting server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
pause[/code]

“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java

u see jdk 1.6.0 if u use version 5 u need to put 1.5.0
